response.original_title: 1950 New York Yankees: The Official World Series Film
response.overview: The 1950 World Series was between the Philadelphia Phillies and the New York Yankees. The 1950 World Series title would be the second of a record five straight titles for the New York Yankees (1949â€“1953). The two teams would not meet again in the Series for 59 years.
response.title: 1950 New York Yankees: The Official World Series Film
